page.title: 15FAVOURITE FOODS
page.content: Favourite Foods: My name is Vivienne and I am 11 years old. My favourite food is 'Scampi & Chips'. Scampi are shellfish covered in breadcrumbs and deep fried. Chips are peeled potatoes cut into finger shapes and deep fried. This is a meal bought from a 'chip shop', cafe or restaurant. My name is Steven and I am 10 years old. My favourite food is 'Steak & Chips'. Steak is meat from a cow and there are different cuts with different names i.e. Sirloin, Fillet, T-Bone or Rump. It can be fried in butter until tender or grilled. My name is Suzanne and I am 11 years old. My favourite food is 'Apple Pie & Cream'.It is made with pastry,cooking- apples and sugar.It is eaten hot or cold.
